item.title: Introducing Lorris Productions
item.description: I’m pleased to formally announce our new production company, Lorris Productions LLC. The Start of a Journey Lorris Productions may be a new film and television production company, however its creation has been long in the making. For nearly two decades, we have been collecting stories that we hoped would one day be able to see in a cinema, or in my living room, or even on a Broadway stage.
